name: twitch-spotify-request-bot
description: This is a bot that listens to the chat of a given Twitch stream for messages with a Spotify song link in them and then adds that song to a playlist and/or your queue.

TWITCH_CHANNEL.description: Username of the Twitch Channel (Just the username)

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID.description: Your client ID from you app (https://developer.spotify.com/dashboard/applications)

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Your client Secret from you app (https://developer.spotify.com/dashboard/applications)

SPOTIFY_PLAYLIST_ID.description: Your Spotify playlist ID (Just the id from a URI, example: spotify:playlist:id)

TWITCH_TOKEN.description: The token from your Twitch BOT

BOT_USERNAME.description: The username of your Twitch BOT

CHAT_FEEDBACK.description: Enable or disable chat feedback | Use: true or false

ADD_TO_QUEUE.description: Enable or disable adding tracks to the current Spotify queue | Use: true or false

ADD_TO_PLAYLIST.description: Enable or disable adding tracks to the playlist | Use: true or false

SUBSCRIBERS_ONLY.description: Enable or disable subscriber only mode | Use: true or false

HOST.description: https://app-name.herokuapp.com (Replace 'app-name' same as your declaration in 'App name' (First form item) or the 'Open app' button will not work
